channel.title: VPS help..?
channel.description:
Hello everyone
Im buying a vps today and im using: http://x10vps.com/vps-plus.php (P3 $14.95/mo)
1. how many players does that hold? 2. I am going to use the VPS on my laptop can i ever shut off my laptop while vps is on? 3. is it 100% reliable?
Well my server has about 20-50 players. Is this a goos vps for my amount?
And do if my internet goes out will server stay online because of vps?
comment(:

item.title: VPS help..?
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

[quote=“P A N I C, post:1, topic:387363”]Hello everyone

Im buying a vps today and im using:
http://x10vps.com/vps-plus.php (P3 $14.95/mo)

  1. how many players does that hold?
  2. I am going to use the VPS on my laptop can i ever shut off my laptop while vps is on?
  3. is it 100% reliable?

Well my server has about 20-50 players.
Is this a goos vps for my amount?

And do if my internet goes out will server stay online because of vps?

comment(:[/quote]
The first question depends entirely on the server source you are running.
Second. Yes! A VPS is just like having a computer which is placed in a datacenter
Third. VPS company’s usually advertise 99.9% uptime, I would have a search around google looking for reviews if I was you.

And yes your server will stay online if you are running it on the VPS if your internet goes off.

Read full topic
